abstract: Having avoided subprime securities and other major problems that have ravaged its peers, JPMorgan, with a solid balance sheet and an ample pile of capital, is poised to dominate.
lead_paragraph: Having avoided subprime securities and other major problems that have ravaged its peers, JPMorgan, with a solid balance sheet and an ample pile of capital, is poised to dominate.

abstract: Bear Stearns‘ private-equity arm Bear Stearns Merchant Banking is expected to announce today that it will spin off into an independent company with JPMorgan Chase as its largest investor, The Wall Street Journal said.
lead_paragraph: Bear Stearns‘ private-equity arm Bear Stearns Merchant Banking is expected to announce today that it will spin off into an independent company with JPMorgan Chase as its largest investor, The Wall Street Journal said.

headline.main: Bear Stearns Merchant Banking to Be Spun Off

abstract: Bear Stearns sought rescue financing from Singapore’s Temasek in the days before its sale to JPMorgan Chase but was rebuffed, underscoring the growing reluctance of sovereign wealth funds to make high-profile investments, The Financial Times reported.
lead_paragraph: Bear Stearns sought rescue financing from Singapore’s Temasek in the days before its sale to JPMorgan Chase but was rebuffed, underscoring the growing reluctance of sovereign wealth funds to make high-profile investments, The Financial Times reported.

headline.main: Temasek Said to Have Declined Bear Stearns Rescue
